remarks: Subspaces are relatively atomic.  Remark 2 of [Kalmbach] p. 149. ( ~ chrelati analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lrelat.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lrelat.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` W ) $.
lrelat.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lrelat.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) $.
lrelat.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. S ) $.
lrelat.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
lrelat.l $e |- ( ph -> T C. U ) $.
lrelat $p |- ( ph -> E. q e. A ( T C. ( T .(+) q ) /\ ( T .(+) q ) C_ U ) ) $.
$d A q $.
$d S q $.
$d T q $.
$d U q $.
$d W q $.
$d ph q $.
